sentences.en: a bird with a two-foot wingspan
Another proposed F - 16 UCAV has a sixty - foot wingspan and 22,000 pounds of internal fuel capacity.
sentences.cn: 另一中提出来的F-16UCAV方案拥有60英尺翼展和22,000磅内部燃油容量.

sentences.en: He stands 6 - 4 with a wingspan of nearly 80 inches.
sentences.cn: 他站直身长6英尺4英寸,双臂伸张近80英尺.

sentences.en: It is about 15 centimeters in length with a wingspan of 27 centimeters.
sentences.cn: 这只红喉鹨身长约15厘米,翼展27厘米,喉咙和胸部皆呈赤褐色.

sentences.en: The bird has a 1 - metre wingspan.
The wingspan is similiar to the Boeing 747, so it is a very large UAV.
sentences.cn: 翼展和波音747相近, 因此“全球鹰”是一种巨大的无人机.

sentences.en: These feathered giants have the longest wingspan of any bird - up to 11 feet ( 3.4 meters )!
sentences.cn: 这些突出的巨鸟有着所有鸟类当中最长的冀展 - 长可达 3.4 米!

sentences.en: These feathered giants have the longest wingspan of any bird — up to 11 feet ( 3.4 meters )!
sentences.cn: 这些突出的巨鸟有着所有鸟类当中最长的冀展-最长可达3.4米!

trans.tran_en: the distance from the end of one wing to the end of the other
